allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Football Video Analyzer

- Gradio web UI for analyzing football videos
- Gemini 2.0 Flash integration for AI video analysis
- FFmpeg-based clip extraction and concatenation
- Auto-segmentation for large videos \(>1.8GB\)
- Sporty PFF-style UI with Oswald/Roboto fonts
- Cancel and clear video functionality

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
Bash(cmd /c "copy analyzer.py backend\\ && copy clipper.py backend\\ && copy .env backend"")
